summary: An ordinance relating to and providing the rules and regulations for the operation of steam engines and steam boilers in the City of Seattle, licensing the operators thereof, creating the Board of Examining Engineers, providing penalties for violation thereof and repealing Ordinance No. 31704, entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing rules and regulations for the operation of steam engines and boilers in the City of Seattle, licensing the operators thereof, creating the Board of Examining Engineers and providing penalties for violation thereof and repealing Ordinance No. 18423."
